FuncDef: This command defines the Emulated Circuit Identifiers (ECID) to be used for the local (source) end of the circuit emulation service.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the value to be used as the local (source) ECID for the circuit emulation service. On CES packet reception, the ECID in the packet will be compared to the configured local-ecid value. These must match for the packet payload to be used for the TDM circuit. The remote-ecid value is inserted into the MEF-8 CES packet to be transmitted. Values-0 to 1048575.
